taxes.commercial-tax-description: Commercial Tax, currently referred to as Goods and Services Tax (GST) in India, is a tax that is levied on locally manufactured and imported goods and services, and contributes to the GDP of the country

taxes.free-delivery-description: The delivery of the product directly to the recipient's address without charge to the recipient

taxes.standard-delivery-description: A 'Standard Delivery' is an order placed to your normal lead time, delivered door to door, any time between 9am and 5pm working weekdays within that lead time.
